name: Il Cammino Delle Capre - The Goat Path
name_original: Il Cammino Delle Capre - The Goat Path
description:
Il Cammino Delle Capre ("The Goat Path") is a PDF file containing scans of the sold-out risograph zine. 24 pages, 2 color print.

A supernatural story about an IRL haunted farm in Florence, Italy. Collaboration between Kris Mukai & Zachary Zezima v(* w * )
